summary: The conversation is between an employee from the financial platform "Lendplus" and a customer. The employee is the relationship manager and is calling the customer to discuss their investment in the PTP lending platform on the Lendplus platform.
customer_concerns: - The customer's investment in the PTP lending platform on the Lendplus platform is not working properly.
questions_asked: - The customer did not ask any specific questions.
overall_sentiment:
Negative
The customer seems frustrated with the investment and wants to discuss it further, but is currently busy and asks the employee to call back later.
